columns.text: Our most luxurious offer, the Dreams Luxury Suites, are four suites in beautifully renovated cave houses, each with a unique personality combining courteous and warm service with authentic tradition. Three of the suites have a private pool and jacuzzi, and the Nefeli suite has just a jacuzzi. 4 Suites Dreams luxury suites have stayed true to the original style of the island and represent an inimitable sample of traditional Greek archi-tecture. These original houses were built more than 100 years ago, and restored in 2008. Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition. The offered accommodation options represent a new concept of sanctuary with a unique personality. The Suites were designed for the distinctive guest who is able to appreciate a singular kind of comfort, class, space and tranquility. These original houses, more than 100 years old,Â  have been restored and they incorporate modern amenities, while preserving the traditional architecture.

items.title: Foivos Suite
items.description: This suite is the essence of luxury with its seemingly Infinity Private Swimming Pool equipped with hydro massage jets and its private outdoor heated Jacuzzi. Relax in the sun on the plush loungers by day, and on the candle lit terrace of Foivos at dusk.
items.excerpt: This suite is the essence of luxury with its seemingly Infinity Private Swimming Pool equipped with hydro massage jets and its private outdoor heated Jacuzzi. Relax in the sun on the plush loungers by day, and on the candle lit terrace of Foivos at dusk.

items.seo_title: Foivos Suite | Rooms | Dreams Luxury Suites
items.seo_description: The Foivos Suite features 2 large bedrooms, 2 bathrooms & a large living area The terrace has a pool & a jacuzzi. Breathtaking views. Up to 5 guests. Book now!

items.title: Armonia Suite
items.description: True to its name, Armonia Suite is where luxury and comfort live in perfect harmony. Depending on your mood, you can relax outdoors under the shade or the sun, or listen to music in the fully-equipped plush living room.

items.seo_description: The Armonia Suite features an infinity pool, an outdoor jacuzzi, a spacious living room & stunning views of the volcano. Up to 2 guests. Stay here now!

items.title: Orfeas Suite
items.description: This Suite is a paradise consisting of a plush living room with two built-in sofa beds, a separate bedroom with a king size bed, an old traditional kitchenette and a really impressive oversized en suite green bathroom.

items.title: Nefeli Suite
items.description: Decorated in Aegean hues, this Suite comprises a panoramic patio with an outdoor heated Jacuzzi overlooking the sea â just for two. Romantically lit by lanterns, it is the ideal place to sip a glass of chilled sparkling wine as the day slips into night and the sunset colors fill the sky.

items.title: Good To Know
items.description: Dreams Luxury Suites is the place where style, luxury, and perfection meet a world of beauty and tradition.

items.title: Athermi Suites Santorini
items.description: A compelling blend of legendary old-school hospitality in an unsurpassed location. Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming. A domestic and stylish atmosphere combined with exceptionally personalised service that affords guests an intimate glimpse of everyday life on Santorini, without sacrificing comfort or privacy. Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home. All suites boast big verandas facing the sea, and their interiors in simple, elegant, Cycladic style perfectly complement the majestic views over the Aegean. A compelling blend of unsurpassed location and legendary old-school hospitality, Athermi Suites invites you to experience Santorini at its purest and most overwhelming. Let the loving couple Maria and Kosmas welcome and pamper you at what is more than just a place to stay. As soon as you cross the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites you will feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home.Â The simple, elegant interiors in the internationally famous local Cycladic style complement the majestic views over the Aegean in absolute harmony, as all suites boast big verandas facing the sea.For a refreshing dip you may opt for the propertyâs sensational pool, one of the largest in the Caldera. But whatever you do, make sure you do not miss the opportunity to indulge in Mariaâs special treats, prepared especially for you. In Santoriniâs lesser known Megalohori village, couples and families will discover a slice of paradise.
items.excerpt: Walk through the picturesque wooden gates of Athermi Suites and feel the embrace of its warm, personalised and discreet service that will make you feel right at home.

amenities.item: Ideal for wedding ceremonies at the hotelâs chapel, and wedding receptions by the pool
One of only a few 3* superior new boutique hotels on the cliffside
All suites have magnificent views of the Aegean Sea, volcano and sunset

items.title: Aliko Luxury Suites
items.description: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece. Located on the most privileged spot of the island, in the scenic village of Imerovigli, at the highest point of the world-famous volcanic Caldera, they offer from all angles an alluring sea view of the Aegean Sea, a big part of Santorini, the neighbouring islands, and the stunning Caldera. Being the best choice for suites accommodation in Imerovigli, Aliko Luxury Suites guarantee an unforgettable romantic escape for couples. In a splendid exclusive setting, admiring the fascinating sea view, you will feel like the blessed inhabitants of a private paradise. Design is slick and minimal while staying true to the traditional style and not compromising on the extra touches that put these suites among the very best luxury accommodations on Santorini.
items.excerpt: Aliko Luxury Suites are ideal for couples seeking suites accommodation with sea view on the awe-inspiring Santorini Island, in Greece.

amenities.item: All suites with magnificent view to the Aegean sea, volcano and sunset
Complimentary champagne glasses on the first sunset
